summary.description:
Today, cooler for the feels like temperature (down 6.9°C) and outside temperature (down 6.0°C), more moisture-laden outside humidity (up 7%), and drier conditions in rainfall (down 0.4 mm).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in cloud levels (up 594 m).

The past week and month had observable variation in cloud levels (up 1546 m), feels like temperature (up 8.8°C), outside temperature (up 7.5°C), and dew point temperature (up 4.1°C) when compared to today.

cloud levels.description:
Today’s average cloud levels is 594.5m lower than yesterday, 551.7m lower than the past week, 1545.9m lower than the past month.

Yesterday’s cloud levels showed a low of 1059m and a peak of 3380m, averaging 1129.8m; the week and month recorded warmer averages.

summary.summary: Inside; comfortable and pleasant temperatures. Outside; you can expect comfortable, mild temperatures. Also, air moisture should feel ok. Drizzle or light rain possible, cloud cover will be variable, overcast at times, and the light is absent. Weather could become unsettled.
